# Morgan Lee

> DevRel engineer and open source advocate

## Links

- [GitHub](https://github.com/morganlee): Open source contributions
- [Blog](https://morganlee.dev/blog): Technical writing
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/morganlee): Community updates
- [YouTube](https://youtube.com/@morganlee): Tutorial videos and talks
- [Email](mailto:hello@morganlee.dev)

## Work

- [devtools-cli](https://github.com/morganlee/devtools-cli) - Developer productivity toolkit
- [docs-generator](https://github.com/morganlee/docs-generator) - Auto-generate docs from source

## Preferences

- Communication: Mixed (async preferred, sync OK for pairing)
- Timezone: US Eastern (UTC-5)
- Response time: Same day for DMs, 48h for email
